item.title: Some one help me pritty please!
item.dc:creator: @caboose420 caboose420
item.description:
@caboose420 wrote:

i do and i don’t i tryed all the ways the food wasn’t coded into my new server when i got it so i got alot of work to do and plus that heal command didn’t work so i messed with the blood barrage and put it onto the “no emote” and now when u click ur “no emote” u heal ur self =p if u want i can get u the coding for it…here is the coding this allso works with ice barrage spells alltho i can’t seemt o get tb to actuly tb u when u click an emote such as like “think” but i got “angry” to ice barrage “no emote” to heal with blood barrage and i can’t get the tb to work with “think emote” lol but any ways heres the coding that i used

case 169: // no emote startAnimation(0x358); startAnimation(1979); hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(64); NewHP += hitDiff; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); break;

i hope that helps any one if they need help but thats for the blood barrage to heal u thats not for ice barrage

item.title: Some one help me pritty please!
item.dc:creator: @caboose420 caboose420
item.description:
@caboose420 wrote:

i need help with getting a healing command that heals ur guy and cuz i can’t get food to work on the new server i just started coding tahts why i’m trying to use a command to heal ur self and it’s not working for me as i hoped so if any one can help me i would be very thankfull and btw guys this is the healing command i cerently got

if(command.startsWith("heal")) { //(playerHeal)[playerHeal][20]; }

i’v tryed alot of other ways but they all just don’t work so if any one can help me please please please help me.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 31, 2007, 02:36:28 AM[/size][hr]any one?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 31, 2007, 03:09:27 AM[/size][hr]FFS GUYS I REALLY NEED HELP WILL ANY ONE BE WILLINGLY ABLE TO HELP ME OUT!!!
[center] Triple Posting[/center]
